name: (Mod)packing the Sandbox: Design and Extensible Games
description: History rhymes, and DAOs and early modding communities may come to be viewed as precursors to the Autonomous Worlds of tomorrow. Examining this prehistory from a design perspective, this session will discuss the challenges of distributed authorship and the tools we have available as we move forward.

speakers.name: Click_save
speakers.bio: Click_save is the Design Lead at Cartridge, a NYC based company building gaming infrastructure on Starknet & onchain games themselves with Dojo.
